entity.name: song
entity.query: SELECT sng_mstr.song_id, sng_mstr.song_name, sng_mstr.isrc, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT alb_mstr.album_name) as album_name, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT art_mstr.artist_name) as audio_artists , GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(tags_mstr2.tag_name,'@@',tags_mstr1.tag_name)) as tags, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pl_mstr.playlist_id) as playlist_ids, sng_mstr.language_id as language_id FROM saregama_db.song_mstr sng_mstr left join saregama_db.song_album sng_alb on sng_alb.song_id=sng_mstr.song_id left join saregama_db.album_mstr alb_mstr on ( alb_mstr.album_id=sng_alb.album_id and alb_mstr.status =1 ) left join saregama_db.artist_song art_sng on ( art_sng.song_id = sng_mstr.song_id) left join saregama_db.artist_mstr art_mstr on (art_sng.artist_id = art_mstr.artist_id and art_mstr.status=1) left join saregama_db.language_mstr lng_mstr on (lng_mstr.language_id = sng_mstr.language_id) left join saregama_db.song_tags sng_tags on (sng_tags.song_id = sng_mstr.song_id) left join saregama_db.tags_mstr tags_mstr1 on (sng_tags.tag_id = tags_mstr1.tag_id) left join saregama_db.tags_mstr tags_mstr2 on (tags_mstr1.parent_tag_id = tags_mstr2.tag_id) left join saregama_db.playlist_song pl_sng on (pl_sng.song_id =sng_mstr.song_id) left join saregama_db.playlist_mstr pl_mstr on(pl_mstr.playlist_id=pl_sng.playlist_id and pl_mstr.status=1) where sng_mstr.status =1 group by sng_mstr.song_id
